title: Spoilers: The Favourite
description:
This week on Spoiler Specials, Dana Stevens discusses The Favourite with Washington Post columnist, Alexandra Petri. 
Podcast production by Danielle Hewitt.
This episode is brought to you by the following advertisers: 
Slack, the collaboration hub for work. Learn more at Slack.com. 
Helix, a new kind of DNA testing. Try today for a deep discount at helix.com/spoiler. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
